api.connection_to_endpoint_failed: Connection to endpoint is unreliable or unavailable
api.connection_to_endpoint_failed_details: Go to Settings to setup a working API Endpoint

app.meta_description: this is the description of our memberclient that get parsed in to the corresponding meta tags
app.title: eosDac Member Client

contract_errors.BURN_LOCKED_TOKEN: Burn tokens on transferLocked token. The issuer must `unlock` first.
contract_errors.BURN_UNKNOWN_SYMBOL: Attempting to burn a token unknown to this contract
contract_errors.GENERAL_MEMBER_HAS_NOT_AGREED_TO_ANY_TER: Account has not agreed to any terms
contract_errors.GENERAL_REG_MEMBER_NOT_FOUND: Account is not registered with members.
contract_errors.ISSUE_NON_EXISTING_SYMBOL: token with symbol does not exist, create token before issue
contract_errors.MEMBERUNREG_ACTIVE_CANDIDATE: An active candidate must resign their nomination as candidate before being able to unregister from the members.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_DUPLICATE_TERMS: Next member terms cannot be duplicate of the latest.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_EMPTY_HASH: Member terms document hash cannot be empty.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_HASH_TOO_LONG: Member terms document hash should be less than 32 characters long.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_TERMS_TOO_LONG: Member terms document url should be less than 256 characters long.
contract_errors.NEWPERIOD_EARLY: New period is being called too soon. Wait until the period has completed.
contract_errors.NEWPERIOD_EXPECTED_CAND_NOT_FOUND: Corrupt data: Trying to set a lockup delay on candidate leaving office.
contract_errors.NEWPERIOD_VOTER_ENGAGEMENT_LOW_ACTIVATE: Voter engagement is insufficient to activate the DAC.
contract_errors.NOMINATECAND_ALREADY_REGISTERED: Candidate is already registered and active.
contract_errors.NOMINATECAND_PAY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Requested pay limit for a candidate was exceeded.
contract_errors.NOMINATECAND_STAKING_FUNDS_INCOMPLETE: A registering candidate must transfer sufficient tokens to the contract for staking.
contract_errors.REMOVECUSTODIAN_NOT_CURRENT_CUSTODIAN: The entered account name is not for a current custodian.
contract_errors.UNLOCK_NON_EXISTING_SYMBOL: token with symbol does not exist, create token before unlock
contract_errors.UNSTAKE_CANNOT_UNSTAKE_FROM_ACTIVE_CAND: Cannot unstake tokens for an active candidate. Call withdrawcand first.
contract_errors.UNSTAKE_CANNOT_UNSTAKE_UNDER_TIME_LOCK: Cannot unstake tokens before they are unlocked from the time delay.
contract_errors.UPDATEBIO_BIO_SIZE_TOO_LONG: The bio should be less than 256 characters.
contract_errors.UPDATECONFIG_INVALID_AUTH_HIGH_TO_NUM_EL: The auth threshold can never be satisfied with a value greater than the number of elected custodians
contract_errors.UPDATECONFIG_INVALID_AUTH_MID_TO_LOW_AUT: The low auth threshold cannot be greater than the mid auth threshold.
contract_errors.UPDATECONFIG_INVALID_CONTRACT: Invalid contract attempt to be set for notifying.
contract_errors.UPDATEREQPAY_EXCESS_MAX_PAY: Requested pay amount limit for a candidate was exceeded.
contract_errors.UPDATETERMS_NO_EXISTING_TERMS: Existing terms not found for the given ID
contract_errors.VOTECUST_DUPLICATE_VOTES: Added duplicate votes for the same candidate.
contract_errors.VOTECUST_MAX_VOTES_EXCEEDED: Max number of allowed votes was exceeded.
contract_errors.VOTECUST_VOTING_FOR_INACTIVE_CAND: Attempting to vote for an inactive candidate.

default.constitution_has_been_updated: The Constitution has been updated. Please sign the updated Constitution to use the Member Client.
default.permission_denied_message: Sorry, you do not have permission to view this page.
default.you_have_not_yet_registered: You have not been registered as a Member yet. Please sign the constitution to use the Member Client.

index.description_p1: eosDAC is a decentralized autonomous community which means it is owned and operated by the token holders who agree to the constitution and register as members of the community.
index.description_p2: When completed, this member client will allow you to read the constitution, register as a member, submit worker proposals, register as a custodian candidate, vote on custodians, transfer tokens, and more. If you have any questions, please reach out to us using the links below.
index.discord_description: eosDAC exists as an active, engaged community building tools to enable other DACs. Discord is where we bring our skills together and coordinate our activites.
index.website_description: Everything you'd like to know about eosDAC can be found on our website at eosdac.io. Visit today and learn more about the community run EOS block producer.
index.welcome_to_esodac_member_client: Welcome to the eosDAC Member Client

initialize.identity_request_denied: Identity request was denied. Please try again and accept the request
initialize.scatter_is_locked: Scatter is locked. Please unlock to continue
initialize.scatter_not_available: Scatter is not available. If you have Scatter installed please refresh.

markdown_viewer.select_text_to_edit: Highlight the text you want to edit.

msig_creator.step1_desc: Select an account from which you want to propose a multisignature transaction or specify an individual action.
msig_creator.step2_desc: Add actions to the multisignature transaction.
msig_creator.step3_desc: Give the msig transaction a title and description
msig_creator.step4_descl: Set a date on which the transaction should expire. The transaction will be unexecutable after this date even if all signatures are collected.
msig_creator.step4_descr: Configure additional options from the msig. Don't change if you're not sure.
msig_creator.step5_desc: Please review your msig carefully. You can jump back and forth to make changes.
msig_creator.title: title
msig_creator.msig_delay: Add a delay for executing the msig in seconds

nodeselector.click_connect_below: Click Connect below to automatically connect to the fastest endpoint to your location selected from the top EOS block producers.
nodeselector.error_chain_id: The chain ID returned by the endpoint is incorrect.
nodeselector.error_invalid_url: The URL seems to be invalid.
nodeselector.select_the_endpoint_you_would_like: Select the endpoint you would like to use and click Connect. Endpoints from the top block producers have been provided for you, but you can also specify your own custom endpoint by populating the input with a url, and pressing Connect.
nodeselector.specify_your_own: Specify your own custom endpoint by populating the input with an url and click the connect button.

regcandidate.msg_reqpay_error: please fill in a payment amount.
regcandidate.page_description_active_custodian: You are currently active as an eosDAC custodian board member.
regcandidate.page_description_registered: Thank you for registering as a candidate to serve on the eosDAC custodian board. As part of your candidacy registration, some of your tokens have been staked.
regcandidate.page_description_unregistered: This page is for registering as a candidate for a position on the custodian board. This position comes with responsibiliies outlined in the eosDAC Constitution. Please, do not register as a candidate unless you fully understand and can meet the responsibilites of an eosDAC custodian board member. Please review section 5 of the constitution carefully before registering.
regcandidate.pay_description: Please fill in The amount you want to receive for being a custodian during one period. The maximum amount is {requested_pay}.
regcandidate.profile_not_confirmed: You submitted your profile but it is still unconfirmed on the blockchain, please wait and try again.
regcandidate.profile_required: To register as a candidate you need a confirmed profile.
regcandidate.stake_description: Please specify the amount of tokens you want to stake. The minimum amount is {minimum_stake}.
regcandidate.unstake_description: Please note, the unstaking action has a built in delay of 60 minutes from the time you unstake before you will see the funds back in your wallet. Please be patient for the transfer to complete. Also, if you were ever elected as a custodian, the funds will be held in a smart contract for a number of days, currently set to:

register.already_registered: You are already registered as a eosDAC Member.
register.congratulations_registered: Congratulations! You are now registered as an eosDAC Member.
register.must_sign_constitution: In order to become a Member of eosDAC you have to agree and sign the Constitution.
register.updated_constitution: The constitution has been updated. Please sign the constitution to continue.

scatter_signin.choose_authentication_type: Please choose an authentication type to sign into the eosDAC Member Client.
scatter_signin.identity_request_denied: Identity request was denied. Please try again and accept the request.
scatter_signin.scatter_is_locked: Scatter is locked. Please unlock to continue.
scatter_signin.scatter_is_not_available: Scatter is not available. If you have Scatter installed please refresh or go to Permissions, remove the permission for this site, and try again.
scatter_signin.scatter_is_outdated: Your Scatter is outdated. Please update your Scatter and try again.

scatter_tutorial.if_you_are_unable_to_choose_an_identity: If you are unable to choose an identity, follow the steps below.
scatter_tutorial.import_identity_instructions:
Go to your Identities section.
On your Identity click on the pencil icon.
Inside your Identity, go to the "Account" section.
Now choose your imported account from the list.
Save your Identity with the Save button in the top right.
scatter_tutorial.make_sure_active_key: Make sure that you have your active key for your account imported into scatter.
scatter_tutorial.unable_to_connect: If you are unable to connect to Scatter, follow the steps below to reset your permissions.

settings.click_below_to_unregister_membership: Click the button below to unregister your eosDAC membership
settings.click_register_now: Click "Register Now" to become a member of eosDAC.
settings.toolbar_menu_items_s: Display balances in the toolbar. (big screens only)
settings.toolbar_profile_image_s: Display your avatar next to the login button
settings.notify_dac_msg_s: Enable live notifications from actions made on the DAC smart contracts
settings.debug_data_structure_s: Display data structures on the bottom of each page
settings.debug_console_log_s: Toggle logging messages to the browser console
settings.trx_delay_l: Set a delay on transactions in seconds
settings.auto_logout_delay_l: Automatically log out after the specified amount of inactivity in minutes. 0 is never log out

transaction.by_completing_agree: By completing this transaction, I agree to the following terms.
transaction.warning_bandwidth: Low Network Bandwidth. Your network bandwidth allocation has less than 10% remaining. The Transaction might fail.
transaction.warning_cpu: Low CPU. Your CPU allocation has less than 10% remaining. The Transaction might fail.
transaction.warning_ram: Low RAM. Your RAM allocation has less than 10% remaining. The Transaction might fail.
transaction.warning_ricardian: The ricardian contract for this action could not be found. Are you sure you want to execute this transaction?

verify_token.copied_to_clipboard: Copied the token to your clipboard!
verify_token.description: You've been redirected to this page to pair an eos account with a discord id. Please sign the message and go back to the discord bot. Run the command $verify.
verify_token.title: Verify token

vote_custodians.description_main: The Custodian Board manages the operations and affairs of the DAC, including but not limited to the governance and administration of the assets and liabilities of the DAC. The following DAC members have vested some of their tokens to submit themselves and candidates for a position on the custodian board which last for 7 days. Every 7 days, your votes are recalculated to select who will be part of the next custodian board. Voting is important! Please vote often and stay engaged within the DAC to know who is providing value.
vote_custodians.description_side: You can vote for up to 5 custodian candidates at a time. Please select candidates who you think will bring value to the DAC.
vote_custodians.voting_disabled_text: Voting is currently disabled. You are able to test out the graphical interface but your votes won't be submitted to the chain. Voting will be enabled shortly.

vote_eosdac.added_to_list: Our BP is added to your vote list.
vote_eosdac.please_delete: Please delete a vote to replace with {eosdac_bp}.
vote_eosdac.remove_vote: Please remove one of your votes.

votingprogress.activated_at: The DAC will be activated at 15%
votingprogress.threshold_met: Voting threshold of 15% met. eosDac is unlocked.

wallet.or_select_address_book: Or select a Destination Account from AddressBook
